name: My Inner Demon
description:
"Seeing one crow means bad luck.
Two crows mean good luck.
Three crows means health.
Four means wealth.
Five is sickness.
And the sixth means death."

Explore the dark and mysterious with Elly and unlock the secrets of the past.

How to play:

Movement - WSAD
Action - E
Pause - Esc
Journal- J

Credits:

Thank you to each artist that contributed towards helping me create this game. Thank you to Ors373 and Garathil for their help and support. Thank you to GameDevHq and AdventureDev for their positive criticism and praise when I show them snippets of my progress.
Special mentions to Kevin MacLeod for his wonderful music that inspires me and Ivy Dupler and Edwyn Tiong for voice acting my characters in the game, it makes the game seem more real.

Lastly thank you to my mom, for her believe in me, I dedicate this game to her.

To the gamers:

Enjoy! At last, set aside about an hour for an interactive story adventure/ mystery.
WARNING: No Save and Load function yet. But there is a Pause Menu in the game.
